changeSet.sql: update rule_set rs set item_id = (select item_id from item where oc_oid = ( select substring(rule_expression.value from '[A-Z_0-9]*$') from rule_set, rule_expression where rule_set.rule_expression_id = rule_expression.id and rule_set.id = rs.id))
